# National Eutrophication Survey Data Package

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
# install devtools if not found
# install.packages(devtools)
devtools::install_github("jsta/nesRdata")
```


## Usage

```{r }
library(nesRdata)
```

### Download external data and store in file system

```{r message=FALSE}
# for demonstration purposes we will set on-the-fly compilation to FALSE
nes_get(version_id = "1", compile = FALSE)
```

### List files

```{r }
nes_ls(version_id = "1")
```

### Compile version

```{r }
# these files have metadata headers that need to be skipped
nes_compile(version_id = "1")
```

### List versions

```{r }
nes_versions()
```

### Load data

```{r }
dt <- nes_load(version_id = "1")
names(dt)
lapply(dt, head)
```
